full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,SNGAGS KYI BKLAG THABS BSDUS PA 'GREL PA MTHONG DON GSAL ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @016A *, ,CES PA SNGAGS KYI BKLAG THABS BSDUS PA'I t'I KKA MTHONG BA DON GSAL ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI, SNAR THANG PAn CHEN SAm GHA SHR'IS, BLO DMAN RNAMS KYI DON DU DPAL RTZE THANG GI CHOS GRV'A CHEN PO'I GTZUG LAG KHANG DU LEGS PAR SBYAR BA RE ZHIG RDZOGS SO, ,'DIS KYANG SANGS RGYAS KYI BSTAN PA LA PHAN PA MTHA' YAS PA 'BYUNG BAR GYUR CIG ,SMRAS PA, 'PHAGS YUL MKHAS PA'I BZHENG SROL BZHIN, ,LEGS SBYAR SKAD KYI KLOG TSUL 'DI, ,GSANG SNGAGS BZLAS BRJOD BYED PA LA, ,NYER MKHO GCIS PA'I CHA LAG TU, ,MTHONG NAS LHAG BSAM DGE BA CAN, ,DGE SLONG NGAG DBANG BZOD PA YIS, ,CHOS SDE CHEN PO SKU 'BUM DU, ,MTHUN RKYEN SBYAR NAS PAR DU BSGRUBS, ,DGE BAS BDAG GZHAN SKYE 'GRO KUN, ,SGRA SBYOR SNGAGS KYI BKLAG TSUL RNAMS, ,MA NOR JI BZHIN LEGS RTOGS NAS, ,MCHOG MTHUN DNGOS GRUB 'THOB GYUR CIG , ,,AOm SVASTI, TSUL 'DI TSE LDAN BSOD NAMS GUNG GI SHOG ,DPYOD LDAN DGE SLONG AA LEM ZHES BYA GYIS, ,CHOS SBYIN RGYA CHER SPEL BAS 'GAL RKYEN SEL, ,MTHUN RKYEN SBYAR TE DPAR DU LEGS PAR BSGRUBS, ,LEGS BYAS 'DI MTSON DUS GSUM DGE BA'I MTHUS, ,TSE RABS KUN TU DAL 'BYOR RTEN BRGYUD DE, ,DPAL LDAN BLA MAS DGYIS BZHIN RJES BZUNG NAS, ,SMIN GROL LAM BZANG MYUR DU MTHAR PHYIN SHOG ,DPAR RKO BA BA SBYIN PA GYIS DPAR DU LEGS PAR BSGRUBS, ,'DI KYANG RGYAL BA'I BSTAN PA DAR ZHING RGYAS PAR GYUR CIG ,SARBA MANGGA LAm, BKRA SHIS, ,
